answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Kyle,
Sustainability survey results show that several localities in Ohio have established a policy to only purchase Energy Star equipment when available. This isn't exactly what you are looking for, but it may be helpful as a beginning. They are Oberlin, Troy, Loveland, Delaware,  Jefferson, West Carrollton, West Chester, Wyoming, and Willard.  
Best regards,


Kyle,

author: Kyle Kridler
text:
The city of Dublin, Ohio is in the process of creating a formal Administrative Order to address our Sustainability Purchasing/Procurement Policy and we need it to meet LEED Standards.  Is there a specific website that maps out what the LEED Standards are for a Sustainability Purchasing Policy, or does anyone have a formal policy that they would be willing to share?  Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you!
title: Sustainability Purchasing/Procurement Policy
